title: Data Annotator

bullets.text: Challenging code generation abilities by creating realistic use cases and system prompts

bullets: Corrected LLM outputs for accuracy, robustness, and instruction following to inform model updates
Engineered multi-step prompts to expose model weaknesses in reasoning, planning, and tool-use pipelines
Created training data for improving LLM ability to write efficient and correct code
Developed skills for effectively describing human and object movement in video

title: Research Assistant
bullets: Created Python data processing pipelines using NumPy, pandas, and RegEx
Interfaced with large respondant data sets to draw new conclusions from prior studies
Proposed a plan to eliminate participant biases from survey study through algorithms
